title: The S.O.S Crew - Spoonful
description:
[align=center]This is a Greek skateboarding film from Athens. It has been captured with a Sony VX-1000 for the best progressive skateboard action.
[url=http://sosskateboards.bigcartel.com/product/spoonful][img]https://images.bigcartel.com/bigcartel/product_images/157599499/max_h-1000+max_w-1000/IMG_20150427_171208.jpg[/img][/url]
Order the full length video [url=http://sosskateboards.bigcartel.com/product/spoonful][u]HERE[/u][/url] and get a crispy DVD with the full 71'min.
[size=22][b]Nestor Suki's "Spoonful" Part[/b][/size]
[tube]rapeCCxW95A[/tube]
[url=http://www.instagram.com/s.o.s__skateboards][img]https://images.bigcartel.com/bigcartel/theme_images/14217403/-/IMG_2490m.jpg[/img][/url]

title: Enjoi - Tweak The Beef
description: "Tweak The Beef was not just skateboard DVD and video on Thrashermagazine.com, it was a full viral assault that I lead. It was sixteen videos dropping consecutively to promote the team video in a way that wasn’t done at the time. From team introductions, to commercials, to slam sections, to a skatepark section… this was a video drop like no other. We even coordinated a product giveaway to coincide with the release. this launch had it all. This was a heavy hitting, viral, marketing campaign." -Matt Eversole

Additional Filmers: Nick Boserio, Dane Brady, Ryan Garshell, Nick Rios, Johnny Wilson, Ryan Lee, Orion Stefanidis, Will Miles, Mack Scharff, Hadrien Buhannic, Pontus Alv, Geoff Campbell, Love Ohlin, Connor Peterson, Paul Young, Waylon Bone.

Sound mixing by Jean-Louis Huhta

title: Öctagon
description:
“The Öctagon is totalitarian and omniscient. Billions of data are generated by this independent system and build a unique reality. Individuals live within the Öctagon. Geographic space doesn’t exist for real, it is not tangible but still defined by a multitude of data."

A video by Joaquim Bayle.
